title: Purchase History
body: Where can i see my whole purchase history that who gifted me which skins or other stuff from when i started the game, i want to see who gift me which skin and when i want the whole history please if there is any possible way please let me know.

replies.body: The last 90 days are available through the client store page!  The entire history, though, will need to be accessed through the[ Riot Privacy](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/) page.  You may need to pay a processing fee to collect this information, though!
